languages.text: "Уверен, что различные методы истязаний ей тоже весьма по нраву. Из нее бы вышел отличный питомец, которого можно было бы обучить многим интересным командам".
"I am sure she is quite fond of various methods of torture, too. She would make a fine pet, one trained to respond to many interesting commands."
languages.original_text: "Уверен, что различные методы истязаний ей тоже весьма по нраву. Из нее бы вышел отличный питомец, которого можно было бы обучить многим интересным командам".

traits.locale_text: "I am sure she is quite fond of various methods of torture, too. She would make a fine pet, one trained to respond to many interesting commands."
"I am sure she is quite fond of various methods of torture, too. She would make a fine pet, one trained to respond to many interesting commands."
"I am sure she is quite fond of various methods of torture, too. She would make a fine pet, one trained to respond to many interesting commands."
"I am sure she is quite fond of various methods of torture, too. She would make a fine pet, one trained to respond to many interesting commands."
"I am sure she is quite fond of various methods of torture, too. She would make a fine pet, one trained to respond to many interesting commands."
"I am sure she is quite fond of various methods of torture, too. She would make a fine pet, one trained to respond to many interesting commands."

languages.text: «No me cabe duda de que también es conocedora de varios métodos de tortura. Sería una excelente mascota, con unas órdenes ya aprendidas de lo más interesantes, además».
languages.original_text: "I am sure she is quite fond of various methods of torture, too. She would make a fine pet, one trained to respond to many interesting commands."

traits.locale_text: «No me cabe duda de que también es conocedora de varios métodos de tortura. Sería una excelente mascota, con unas órdenes ya aprendidas de lo más interesantes, además».

languages.text: 「彼女はきっと、さまざまな種類の拷問が好きで、多くの命令に応えられるように訓練された、立派なペットになることでしょう」
languages.original_text: "I am sure she is quite fond of various methods of torture, too. She would make a fine pet, one trained to respond to many interesting commands."

traits.locale_text: 「彼女はきっと、さまざまな種類の拷問が好きで、多くの命令に応えられるように訓練された、立派なペットになることでしょう」

languages.text: “我相信，她一定也会喜欢各种各样的折磨手段。只要加以训练，她应该能变成不错的宠物，会对许多有趣的命令做出反应。”
languages.original_text: "I am sure she is quite fond of various methods of torture, too. She would make a fine pet, one trained to respond to many interesting commands."

traits.locale_text: “我相信，她一定也会喜欢各种各样的折磨手段。只要加以训练，她应该能变成不错的宠物，会对许多有趣的命令做出反应。”

languages.text: "Ich bin sicher, auch sie liebt vielfältige Foltermethoden. Sie wäre ein nettes Spielzeug, das auf viele interessante Befehle konditioniert ist."
languages.original_text: "I am sure she is quite fond of various methods of torture, too. She would make a fine pet, one trained to respond to many interesting commands."

traits.locale_text: "Ich bin sicher, auch sie liebt vielfältige Foltermethoden. Sie wäre ein nettes Spielzeug, das auf viele interessante Befehle konditioniert ist."

languages.text: « Nul doute qu'elle partage la même fascination pour différentes méthodes de torture. Elle ferait un excellent animal de compagnie, entraînée comme elle est à obéir à toutes sortes d'ordres fascinants. »
languages.original_text: "I am sure she is quite fond of various methods of torture, too. She would make a fine pet, one trained to respond to many interesting commands."

traits.locale_text: « Nul doute qu'elle partage la même fascination pour différentes méthodes de torture. Elle ferait un excellent animal de compagnie, entraînée comme elle est à obéir à toutes sortes d'ordres fascinants. »

languages.text: "Envaiçeşit işkence türüne düşkün olduğuna da kuşkum yok. Ondan harika bir evcil hayvan olur. Enteresan pek çok komuta tepki vermesi için eğitilebilir."
languages.original_text: "I am sure she is quite fond of various methods of torture, too. She would make a fine pet, one trained to respond to many interesting commands."
